item.title: Mocca - Sing
item.description:
KY: 79237

Sing
sing a song
Sing out loud
sing out strong
Sing of good things
not bad
Sing of happy
not sad
Sing
sing a song
Make it simple to last
your whole life long
Don’t worry that
it’s not good enough
For anyone else
to hear
Just sing
sing a song

la la la la

la la la la la la

item.title: Mocca - Happy!
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60142

Life is just
a bowl of cherries
Sometimes it’s afraid
filled with worries
Don’t be afraid
when things go wrong
Just be
strong
When thing seems up
in the air
And everything is
so unfair
And you stumble
and fall
Just pick yourself
up and sing
If one day you
lose your way
Just remember
one thing my friend
When you’re
under a cloud
Just visit
music and sing
If one day you
lose your way
Just remember that
I’m here to stay
Don’t you
give up
Keep your chin up
and be happy

Life is just
a bowl of cherries
Sometimes it’s afraid
filled with worries
Don’t be afraid
when things go wrong
Just be
strong
When thing seems up
in the air
And everything is
so unfair
And you stumble
and fall
Just pick yourself
up and sing
If one day you
lose your way
Just remember
one thing my friend
When you’re
under a cloud
Just visit
music and sing
If one day you
lose your way
Just remember
one thing my friend
When you’re
under a cloud
Just visit
music and day
If one day you
lose your way
Just remember that
I’m here to stay
Don’t you give up
keep your chin up
Don’t you give up
keep your chin up
Keep your chin up
and be happy

item.title: Mocca - I Remember
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60154

I remember the way you
glanced at me
Yes I remember
I remember
When we caught a
shooting star
Yes I remember
I remember
All the things
that we shared
And the promise we
made just you and I
I remember all the
laughter we shared
All the wishes we made
upon the roof at dawn
Do you remember
when we were dancing
In the rain
in that december
And I remember
when my father
Thought you were
a burglar
I remember
all the things
That we shared
and the promise
We made
just you and I
I remember all the
laughter we shared
All the wishes we made
upon the roof at dawn
Ba ba ba ba ba

ba ba ba ba ba

ba ba ba ba ba
Yes I remember all the
things that we shared
And the promise
we made
Just you and I
I remember
All the
laughter we shared
All the wishes we made
upon the roof at dawn
I remember the way you
read your books
Yes I remember the way
you tied your shoes
Yes I remember
the cake you
Loved the most
yes I remember
The way you
drank your coffee
I remember the way you
glanced at me

Yes I remember when we

In the rain in
that december
And the way you
smile at me
